messages.content: What is the Consistency Decoder for in ComfyUI?
The Consistency Decoder is used to decode images and videos that were generated with the OpenAI VAE model, enhancing the stability and consistency of the output.
Where should I place the downloaded OpenAI VAE model for use with comfyui-consistency-decoder?
You should place the downloaded OpenAI VAE model (decoder.pt) in the 'model/vae' directory for use with comfyui-consistency-decoder.
Where can I find the download link for the OpenAI VAE model?
You can find the download link for the OpenAI VAE model at https://openaipublic.azureedge.net/diff-vae/c9cebd3132dd9c42936d803e33424145a748843c8f716c0814838bdc8a2fe7cb/decoder.pt.
Where can I find an example workflow for using comfyui-consistency-decoder?
You can find an example workflow for using comfyui-consistency-decoder in './workflow.json'.
